alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:57PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rio Blanco County through 130 PM MDT... At 1257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meeker, or 35 miles southwest of Craig, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Rio Blanco County. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 44 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops
